title: The Mystery of the Stuttering Parrot
summary: The latest assignment for the three detectives sounds quite harmless: they are to look for a parrot that has flown away. But as soon as they start their investigation, suddenly some other people seem to be very interested in this parrot. Perhaps because he can quote Latin sayings? But soon it's no longer just about one parrot, but seven - and all seven are making very strange speeches. Could there be a secret message behind it all? In any case, an irascible art dealer and a notorious master thief are also after the birds. The three ??? have to rack their brains before they solve this adventurous case and collect a well-deserved reward...

title: The Secret of Phantom Lake
summary: What secret is hidden in a yellowed letter and in the notes of sailor Angus Gunn that have resurfaced after a long time? Was pirate treasure really stolen from a sinking ship on a stormy night long ago? The three detectives Justus, Bob and Peter would also like to know. Gunn's descendants have not yet succeeded in finding the treasure's hiding place. Professor Shay, who is interested in this matter for his work at the Historical Research Institute, has also had no luck so far. More and more people are turning up and making themselves suspicious. Java Jim, an obscure sailor, is also trying to get ahead of the three? And what role does Stebins, who was in prison for embezzlement and is now on parole, play? The professor suspects that he and Java-Jim are working together. But in the end, the three ??? are one step ahead: the many puzzling clues lead them to the phantom lake and finally to the solution.
speakers: Hitchcock;Erzähler - Peter Pasetti;Justus Jonas, Erster Detektiv - Oliver Rohrbeck;Peter Shaw, Zweiter Detektiv - Jens Wawrczeck;Bob Andrews, Recherchen und Archiv - Andreas Fröhlich;Tante Mathilda - Karin Lieneweg;Patrick Kenneth - Wolfgang Kubach;Java-Jim - Heinz Überreiter [Gottfried Kramer];Mrs. Flora Gunn - Veronika Weckler;Cluny Gunn - Fabian Harloff;Rory - Klaus-Peter Reisch [Peter Buchholz];Stebins - Hans Meinhardt [Karl-Ulrich Meves];Mr. Widner - Ernst von Klipstein;Verwalter von Powder Gulch - Reiner Brönneke;Bibliothekarin - Katharina Brauren

title: The Mystery of the Carpathian Dog
summary: My house is haunted! With this desperate exclamation from Mr. Prentice, a new adventure begins for the three ???. An adventure that gets more and more complicated and in which even the otherwise super-smart First Detective, Justus Jonas, is completely in the dark for a while. - What sinister figure is going in and out of Mr. Prentice's apartment and causing him ever greater fear and terror? What is the source of those ghostly flashes of light in his study, six meters above the street? Who has made the valuable glass sculpture of the Carpathian dog disappear, and who is trying to make it impossible for all the tenants to stay in the large apartment building? The few clues point in different directions, and our trio of detectives once again have a tough nut to crack. Will they be able to shed light on the mystery?

title: The Secret of the Crooked Cat
summary: In a small traveling circus, the three young detectives Peter, Bob and Justus sense their latest case. Because when a sinister-looking man tries to take an ugly black stuffed cat - the main prize of a shooting gallery - by force, finally steals it and the next day places an ad in the newspaper looking for more stuffed cats, then there must be something behind it. What's more, why has the traveling circus been hit by one misfortune after another for weeks? And who is the stranger with the conspicuous tattoo who keeps turning up at the circus but disappears without a trace when the going gets tough? Justus and his friends set out on the trail of him and the stolen cat and are almost put on the wrong track. But after exciting failures, they finally succeed in unraveling the mystery of the black cat and at the last minute tearing the mask off the face of a cunning criminal - in the truest sense of the word...

title: The Mystery of the Ruby's Curse
summary: Alfred Hitchcock and the three detectives (trademark ???) have to deal with a strange legacy: Uncle Horatio has left something valuable to his nephew - but what? And above all, where? The young detectives Justus, Peter and Bob find themselves confronted with far too many plaster heads, mysterious gentlemen and the word August in at least five different meanings. Won't Justus and his friends be overwhelmed by this case?

title: The Mystery of the Talking Skull
summary: Right from the start, Bob and Peter don't think much of the fact that their friend Justus wants to buy an ancient suitcase with unknown contents at an auction. If they had known what dangerous entanglements would result from possession of the suitcase, they would have protested even more vehemently! Not only does it contain the clothes and utensils of a magician and a skull, but the strange skull can also talk! Quite a shock for the three detectives, who certainly don't believe in spooks. And no sooner do they begin to uncover this mystery than a whole gang of dark men is after them and the suitcase. The mysterious sayings of the skull lead the three ??? to a fortune-telling gypsy woman, on the trail of the missing magician and an unsolved bank robbery. But when they get their hands on the last clue to solving the case, everything seems to go wrong...
speakers: Hitchcock;Erzähler - Peter Pasetti;Justus Jonas, Erster Detektiv - Oliver Rohrbeck;Peter Shaw, Zweiter Detektiv - Jens Wawrczeck;Bob Andrews, Recherchen und Archiv - Andreas Fröhlich;Tante Mathilda Jonas - Karin Lieneweg;Patrick Kenneth - Wolfgang Kubach;Gulliver - Joachim Wolff;Mr. Maximillian - Richard Lauffen;Hauptkommissar Reynolds - Horst Frank;Mrs. Miller - Marianne Wolters [Marianne Kehlau];Mr. Grant - Hans Meinhardt [Lothar Grützner];Auktionator - Gerlach Fiedler;Fred Brown - Peter Buchholz;Hauswirt - Reiner Brönneke;Mann - Karl-Ulrich Meves

title: The Mystery of the Creepy Dragon
summary: Looking for a couple of runaway dogs - well, that's not normally a particularly tempting assignment for three clever detectives. But as soon as Justus, Bob and Peter start their search, the dog's owner, Mr. Allen, tells them about a sea monster he claims to have spotted on the coast. Excuse me - sea monsters? But Mr. Allen wasn't joking. During their investigations, the ??? not only come across what appears to be a dragon in the flesh, coughing eerily, but also a mysterious labyrinth of caves, shifting rock faces, armed frogmen and many other oddities. For example, who does the eerie voice on the phone belong to? And what kind of person is this Mr. Shelby? He calls himself a specialist in tricks and jokes of all kinds - but it soon turns out that tricks and jokes can also be taken decidedly too far...

title: The Mystery of the Green Ghost
summary: It's strange that on this evening it's apparently not just Bob and Peter who happen to be visiting the house of the long-dead Mathias Green, which is to be demolished. It is more than strange, in fact highly creepy, when a shimmering green ghost suddenly appears, as witnessed by six full-grown men (or was it seven?) in addition to the two of them. Justus, on the other hand, finds his friends' report neither very strange nor very creepy, but very suspicious - and soon the three ??? are involved in the investigation of a new case. It soon turns out that someone is after a valuable pearl necklace that was found in the condemned house. It is even worth kidnapping, as Bob, Peter and a new friend find out for themselves. But Justus wouldn't be Justus if he didn't have a timely epiphany...

title: The Mystery of the Puzzling Paintings
summary: It's not all that much that the old painter Joshua Cameron left behind - and on top of that, he still owed the rent! But he must have been a strange fellow: the 20 numbered oil paintings from his estate all show the same motif, namely his house. This and the fact that not only a countess and her caretaker, but also several strangers and an art dealer are conspicuously interested in the paintings, bring the three ??? onto the scene. Are the paintings perhaps not quite so worthless after all? Perhaps there is also some connection with the confused words that Cameron stammered in a fever before his death... While Justus, Peter and Bob investigate, their old rival Skinny Norris tries to put obstacles in their way. This ends up being dangerous for him. It's just as well that Justus has a timely epiphany!

title: The Mystery of the Whispering Mummy
summary: Alfred Hitchcock and his friends, the three young detectives Justus, Peter and Bob (the trademark ???), are convinced that a thousand-year-old mummy cannot whisper. But the mummy, which is in the possession of the famous Egyptologist Professor Yarborough, whispers anyway, in an ancient Egyptian dialect that nobody can understand. The three ??? are determined to solve the mystery, even if the mummy's curse should befall them. One large and one small Libyan, one Abyssinian cat too many and thieves by trade and passion put all kinds of difficulties in their way. Is this case not too complicated for the three?

title: The Secret of Terror Castle
summary: Alfred Hitchcock has found helpers to solve unlikely events: The Three???, behind whom the young detectives Justus, Peter and Bob hide. Who could have an interest in organizing the haunting of the castle? Who is determined to keep visitors away from the castle? Together with his friends, Justus tries to unravel the mystery. Will they manage to earn their sponsors as the youngest detective agency? Will they succeed in solving the mystery of the haunted castle?

title: The Mystery of the Screaming Clock
summary: There are alarm clocks that ring, alarm clocks that buzz, alarm clocks that play music or ring bells to wake you up. But Justus, Bob and Peter have never experienced an alarm clock that emits a terrifyingly shrill scream. And they have just tracked down such an oddity in the scrapyard! No wonder this strange construction sparks the curiosity and imagination of the three detectives: who built such an alarm clock and why? As they try to find out, they suddenly find themselves on the trail of a sophisticated art heist. But before they can solve it, there are some tough puzzles to crack...

title: The Mystery of the Laughing Shadow
summary: Shadows are usually silent. But here a shadow laughs - shrill and terrifying! But it's not just this highly unusual shadow that is giving Justus, Bob and Peter a headache. Other strange things seem to be going on at old Miss Sanchez's country estate. For example, what's the story behind the rumor that a valuable Indian treasure is buried nearby - in a place where no man can find it? Before the three boys know it, they are involved in a case that is as dangerous as it is mysterious, because the Indian treasure really does exist! An unscrupulous gangster is trying to capture it and is not only putting the lives of four Indian boys at risk. But thanks to Justus\' ingenuity and courage and with the help of the police, the man is put to rest. In the end, there is no more laughing treasure, but there are three laughing detectives who have once again survived a case unscathed!

title: The Mystery of Monster Mountain
summary: The new adventure that Justus, Bob and Peter have to go on starts quite harmlessly: with the search for a key. But soon suspicious events begin to pile up. Why is Kathleen Hammond, who is supposed to be so enterprising, so reluctant to sign anything? Why is her husband building such a large swimming pool behind the small inn for the few guests? On the hill behind the house, the three ??? discover mysterious traces of an oversized footprint. Then they discover that a guest at the inn seems to be after Kathleen's money. But despite many clues, this time the investigation doesn't seem to make much progress. It is literally only at the last minute that they solve the strange mystery threatening Kathleen and uncover the truth behind the dark legends about a mountain monster.

title: The Mystery of the Nervous Lion
summary: Justus, Bob and Peter are pretty bored at the moment. But at just the right moment, Alfred Hitchcock helps them with an interesting case: George the lion - an attraction in Jim Hall's Jungleland, a zoo for tourists - has been so restless lately. Especially at night... And not only George, but also a gorilla and even a black panther are suddenly roaming free. That can make you feel a bit queasy. Who would be interested in letting wild animals out of their cages? And why are iron bars from Justus\'s uncle's junk shop suddenly in such demand? What do diamonds have to do with the whole story? Justus, Bob and Peter also have to track down strange characters like Hank Murphy, Dobbsie and Olsen, and in doing so they promptly put their lives in danger. Because wild animals and diamond smugglers are not to be trifled with...

title: The Secret of the Haunted Mirror
summary: Fortunately, Justus, Bob and Peter are already used to all sorts of things. So when someone tells them that a huge Spanish mirror belonging to Mrs. Darnley is haunted, and when strange noises are heard in Mrs. Darnley's house at night, at least Justus doesn't get goose bumps so much as a desire to get to the bottom of the matter. As soon as the three ??? start investigating, they come across all sorts of suspicious things: a Spaniard who is interested in the mirror is beaten up; the president of the state of Ruffino knows mysterious things about the mirror and warns against a certain Juan Gomez; political intrigues seem to be ignited by the mirror - and finally even a boy is kidnapped! And all this because of an old mirror? Very strange! But our three clever detectives will find out the truth - bet?

title: The Mystery of the Perilous Inheritance
summary: The mysterious hermit Marcus Towne, known as Dingo, leaves behind a mysterious will. It is written in the form of a multi-part puzzle - the fortune is to go to the person who solves the riddle surrounding this strange >last will<. Why did Dingo draw up such a crazy will? Did he want to put a stumbling block in the way of potential heir hunters? The rightful heirs, together with the lawyer, turn to the three ??? and ask for help in solving the mystery. The three ??? begin to unravel puzzle after puzzle. They soon realize that it is easy to go astray when a puzzler and schemer speaks to posterity. But that's not the only thing that gives them a headache. Ever since they took on the case, they have been surrounded by lurking dangers and unexpected threats. But nothing can shake the three ???. They are bold enough to get to the bottom of this mysterious inheritance!

title: The Secret of Skeleton Island
summary: A flight across the American continent - that's a change not to be sneezed at for the three young detectives Justus, Bob and Peter. And if there's also a job to be done, so much the better: they have to find out who is behind the thefts and acts of sabotage that are causing trouble for a film company on Skeleton Island. There are also some other strange things on this island. The locals are troubled by an old ghost story, rumor of a lost pirate treasure that is said to have sunk into the sea, and are suspicious of the young Greek Chris and his sick father. Could these >strangers< be responsible for the thefts from the film company? The three soon know better - and this knowledge promptly puts them in danger. But now their trust in Chris pays off: Not only does he bravely help them out of a tight spot, but he also makes a decisive contribution to unmasking the wanted thieves, from whom the legendary pirate treasure is also snatched at the last minute...
speakers: Hitchcock;Erzähler - Peter Pasetti;Justus Jonas, Erster Detektiv - Oliver Rohrbeck;Peter Shaw, Zweiter Detektiv - Jens Wawrczeck;Bob Andrews, Recherchen und Archiv - Andreas Fröhlich;Sam - Joachim Wolff;Chris Markos - Stephan Chrzeszinski;Kommissar Nostigon - Volker Brandt;Mr. Shaw - Joachim Richert;Denton - Karl-Heinz Gerdesmann;Farraday - Gottfried Kramer;Jeff - Harald Pages;Bill Ballinger - Günter Flesh;Jim Ballinger - Heinz Werder;Mr. Norris - Horst Schick;Mrs. Barton - Marianne Kehlau

title: The Mystery of Devil's Mountain
summary: Even if you don't believe in ghosts, an evening stroll through the Valley of Sorrows can make your hair stand on end. Of course, our three detectives have to investigate the eerie howling that gives the valley its name. The moaning that starts every evening seems to come from a cave in the Teufelsberg, but as soon as you enter it, silence reigns. Is there any truth to the rumors that El Diablo, an officially dead bandit, is on the loose? Professor Walsh, who, like Justus, Bob and Peter, is staying at the Mendoza ranch, is no more superstitious than the youngsters. But the farm workers are getting more and more nervous. Who is trying everything to keep intruders away from Teufelsberg - and why? Even Justus is in the dark. Until he finds a tiny stone in the cave that is anything but an ordinary stone...

title: The Mystery of the Flaming Footprints
summary: The old potter, known as the Potter, rarely leaves his house in Rocky Beach. But it's not just his hermit-like existence that makes the locals suspicious, it's also his appearance: He has long white hair, a beautifully combed full beard, a flowing white robe and he always walks barefoot. He also wears a ceramic medallion around his neck showing a scarlet eagle with two heads - isn't that very strange? But suddenly he disappears, even though he is expecting a visit from his daughter, Mrs. Dobson, and his grandson Tom. Is a chance, brief encounter with the two somewhat obscure strange men the reason? Another suspicious man, supposedly a sports fisherman, also seems to have a finger in this mysterious pie. They are all after the symbol of a two-headed eagle - an eagle like the one Potter has hanging around his neck. Flaming footprints and the sound of running water in the pipe in the Potter house bring Mrs. Dobson to the brink of hysteria. With their usual inquisitiveness and vigor, the three ??? try to unravel the mystery: Could the Potter be a nobleman from Europe, the double-headed eagle his emblem, his flowing robe a wistful reminder of a princely cloak? - Preserving the incognito - that is often the motto of royalty when they want to remain unrecognized...
speakers: Hitchcock;Erzähler - Peter Pasetti;Justus Jonas, Erster Detektiv - Oliver Rohrbeck;Peter Shaw, Zweiter Detektiv - Jens Wawrczeck;Bob Andrews, Recherchen und Archiv - Andreas Fröhlich;Hauptkommissar Reynolds - Horst Frank;Tante Mathilda - Karin Lieneweg;Mihai Eftimin - Volker Brandt;Dr. Radulescu - Günter Flesh;Potter - Karl-Heinz Gerdesmann;Mrs. Dobson - Marianne Kehlau;Tom Dobson - Alexander Körting;Farrier - Gottfried Kramer;Morton - Andreas von der Meden;Polizist - Hans Irle

title: The Mystery of the Dancing Devil
summary: A series of thefts in Rocky Beach - and each time one of those common black suitcases is missing. The three ??? take on this ominous case. And every time they follow up a new lead, the eerily real figure of a >Dancing Devil

title: The Mystery of the Vanishing Treasure
summary: Just as Justus, Bob and Peter are visiting an exhibition of Japanese art treasures, a particularly valuable jeweled belt is stolen. Too bad the Japanese security guard won't let the three young detectives help solve the brazen theft! But Alfred Hitchcock has a new, rather mysterious case for them: an old lady is allegedly being harassed day and night by little >gnomes<. It goes without saying that the three ??? don't believe in gnomes - but what kind of strange little creatures are they seeing with their own eyes? While they are still puzzling, they are suddenly trapped and become unconscious witnesses to a sophisticated bank robbery. Does a clue lead from the bank robbery to the belt theft? Justus is quicker than the crooks to deduce - with a bit of cleverness and help from the police, this tricky double case is also solved...

title: The Mystery of the Aztec Sword
summary: The brothers Pico and Diego Alvaro lose all their possessions in a fire. A truly unrealistic hope, but one cherished by the three ???, fueled by Justus\'s own sense of intuition, could turn the situation around: if the jewel-studded so-called Aztec sword could be found, which an Alvaro ancestor received as a gift from Cortez himself. Laborious and sometimes life-threatening investigations - and always pursued by obscure strangers - put the three ??? and Diego on a hot track. Will the four boys succeed in finding the legendary Cortez sword before their pursuers do?

Lars' enemies obviously want to frame the three ??? for a robbery. An adventurous chase begins. Will the three friends succeed again this time?

title: The Mystery of the Singing Serpent
summary: Admittedly, Mrs. Patricia Osborne is a somewhat strange lady. Not only does she regard red velvet dresses as a protective shield against the dangers of life and considers cobwebs to be excellent cures - she also firmly believes that a circle drawn around her bed with a knife every night protects her from nightly misfortune! But when she also invites a sinister man called Asmodi to secret meetings where a ghastly singsong emanates from the locked room, her niece Allie has had enough. Without further ado, the girl calls in the Three? Is she right to suspect that someone is trying to take criminal advantage of her aunt's gullibility? Together with Justus, Bob and Peter, she follows Asmodi, who is holding strange cult evenings in a remote house. They sneak in - and watch in horror as a huge snake suddenly appears to writhe between black-cloaked figures in the flickering candles of a strange ceremony! And this snake lets out a gruesome song... Will the three ??? uncover its secret?

title: The Mystery of Death Trap Mine
summary: Allie Jamison can sometimes upset the three ???, stubborn and prejudiced as she is! Or is she right in her suspicion that something is wrong with Wesley Thurgood, her uncle's new neighbor? Actually, the three ??? just wanted to help Allie's uncle prune trees during the summer vacation. But the more strange things happen, the more exciting - and dangerous - it gets for our friends. Isn't it strange that the filthy rich Thurgood has bought the old, abandoned silver mine, the notorious death trap, of all places? And why does he get so angry when Allie tries to explore the mine? Does he perhaps suspect something about the gruesome discovery that the three ??? and Allie will make there? But be careful here! Because Thurgood is not the only one who seems mysterious to the three ??? After all, there are some old towns in the nearby mountains that are now completely deserted. And not far away, the desert begins. Couldn't someone who doesn't have a completely clean slate get the wrong idea?

title: The Mystery of the Magic Circle
summary: In Santa Monica, two momentous events happen at once in one evening: a publishing house goes up in flames - and in the neighboring film lab, all the films of the famous actress Madeline Bainbridge are stolen. When the manuscript of Madeline Bainbridge's memoirs also disappears, the three ???, Justus, Peter and Bob, realize that something is not quite right. Their investigations lead the three detectives into the eerie realm of magic. Everything seems inscrutable. What is the meaning of the magic circle in which the number 13 plays such an important role? What is behind Madeline Bainbridge's mysterious past and what is true about the claim that she is a witch? Is murder by magic real? This is the question the three of them have to solve. During their investigation, they have to overcome the most sinister situations and Peter finds himself in great danger after a crucial discovery...

title: The Mystery of the Deadly Double
summary: Should he really exist, a second... Justus Jonas? Jan, who has taken up residence in the scrapyard out of fear of sneaky crooks, doesn't know that he's getting the three 'Jonases', and especially his counterpart Justus, into big trouble. Danger and chaos lurk at every turn. Justus is caught and locked up by the men in Jan's place. Mysterious messages! Political intrigues across countries and continents! Life-threatening mistakes! An adversary who almost nests himself in the shielded headquarters of the young detectives! But Bob and Peter prove that they can act correctly and deliberately even without their boss. A wild chase begins, because minutes are at stake!

But when the photos are published, the three boys from Rocky Beach come to the attention of the uncanny balancing artist. He leads them astray. A murderous race against time begins.

The first detective senses a new case for the three ??? and offers his help. But what he then learns makes him turn pale. Mrs. Holligan is being threatened, stalked and driven mad by her sister. But her sister was buried three months ago. Justus, Peter and Bob must hurry to solve the case. Mrs. Holligan has a serious heart condition and any new attack could put an end to her life. But why have his parents never contacted him? The first detective reacts headlessly. Without thinking twice, he books a flight and lands in the most dangerous city in Venezuela: the diamond city of Suerte.

Justus, Peter and Bob, the three detectives from Rocky Beach, do their best, but they are up against a powerful opponent.

The three detectives' powers of deduction are put to the test. Enigmatic statues of gods seem to show the way through the maze. But someone is laying false trails, causing the detectives to lose their bearings. Where is the exit from the labyrinth of the gods?

title: The Horror at Campbell Castle
summary: Adam Campbell has inherited a difficult legacy: he has to keep his deceased father's imposing castle in good condition. During a spiritualist session, his father's ghost appears and speaks of a strange legacy. Naturally, the three ??? take up the investigation. They are convinced that they are not dealing with a ghost! Until Peter is pulled into the sea by a creepy black hand. Only at the last second can he be rescued. The second detective suspects something sinister: has he been attacked by a water spirit?

title: The Mystery of the Fiery Flood
summary: Allie Jamison, an old acquaintance of the three ???, is under a heavy curse. At least she is convinced of it. Something terrible is going to happen on the very next night of the full moon! There is only one way out: Justus, Peter and Bob have to solve an alchemical puzzle - in just 24 hours. Their feverish investigations lead the three detectives into a world of magicians and fortune-tellers. But when Justus is lured into an ambush, it's clear: this case is life-threatening!

title: The Nameless Opponent
summary: A neighborhood war threatens to break out in the otherwise idyllic suburb of Seven Pines. The angry residents ask the three ??? for help. But Bob is injured during a night-time tailing operation and loses consciousness. When he regains consciousness, he no longer knows who he is! An old enemy of the three ??? takes merciless advantage of this. While the third detective goes astray in unexpected ways, Justus and Peter have to deal with a dangerous enemy. A seemingly harmless routine case quickly turns into a tough test for the famous trio from Rocky Beach - possibly the toughest they have ever faced...

title: The Ghost Bay
summary: The three ??? take over and (hopefully!) solve their 150th case! In three breathtaking episodes, they are on the trail of the mystery of Ghost Bay! What secret is hidden behind the will that the eccentric Harry Shreber wrote shortly before his death? Do the coded verses really lead to Rashura's treasure? (Part A) The three detectives will have no choice but to dive into Flaming Water (Part B), because only in the depths of the sea can they find out why The Burning Crystal (Part C) has brought so much misfortune to so many people... Part A: Rashura's Treasure The three famous detectives from Rocky Beach have to solve a riddle left to them by the crotchety Harry Shreber in his will. They soon discover that the first clue could be hidden in a wrecked airplane in Shreber's garden. The search for Rashura's treasure begins - but Justus, Peter and Bob are far from the only ones who want to solve the mystery... Part B: Flaming water The trail to Rashura's treasure leads the three ??? high into the mountains, deep underground and out onto the open sea. But with every clue, everything becomes more mysterious ? and more dangerous! A race against time begins... Part C: The Burning Crystal Justus, Peter and Bob have still not been able to solve the mystery of the will. What role do Moby Dick and the burning crystal play? The three ??? go to Ghost Bay to unravel the mystery. But they are not alone! Everyone is playing high stakes in this game that only one person can win...

Denzel insists that he has never seen the painting and is innocent. So how could he have repeatedly painted a central motif from this painting in the past - the black sun? The three ??? have to use all their detective skills to solve this case.

summary: A huge skater convention is taking place in Rocky Beach. All hell is breaking loose in the city, and not just because of the skating event: a number of shady characters are hanging around, shots are being fired and nobody knows exactly who is on which side. An old case involving the three?? suddenly plays an important role again. And without the help of their old and new friends, this could be the last case for one of the three detectives...

summary: The football stadium is buzzing. The Los Angeles Hawks are playing against the Philadelphia Tornados for the American high school championship title. Due to a miscommunication, Peter accidentally overhears someone else's cell phone conversation. What he overhears makes his blood run cold. Unexpectedly, the three ??? have to put a stop to a dangerous blackmailer. Will they be able to solve the football phantom's strange riddles? They must. The life of a man out on the pitch depends on it.

title: The Message from the Underworld
summary: Thanks to his infallible powers of deduction, Justus Jonas has once again solved a case involving the three ??? in no time at all. But as soon as the file is closed, the three detectives receive a letter from a mysterious client. He names himself after Sherlock Holmes' great nemesis "Professor Moriarty" and asks Justus, Peter and Bob to decode a mysterious message for him. The Three?? soon find out that they are pieces in a dangerous game: Uncle Titus is arrested, Inspector Cotta is unreachable - and Moriarty always seems to be one step ahead. But Justus wouldn't be Justus if he didn't accept the challenge!

summary: The old house on the coast once belonged to a puppeteer. The perfect location for their horror movie, think the three ??? and their classmates from the film course. After all, the spooky puppets are still hanging on the walls. When mysterious events occur in their vicinity, Justus, Peter and Bob don't believe in magic at first. But then one of the detectives falls under the spell of a sinister force. Are the puppets involved? Or is someone else pulling the strings in the background?

title: The Dragon's Web
summary: Dragoncourt, the estate of eccentric games programmer Stephen Baron, is up for sale. The man is seriously ill and has retired to Europe. But the estate agent in charge of selling the property is desperate because strange things are happening at Dragoncourt. Clearly, the three successful detectives from Rocky Beach have to investigate! The investigation leads Justus, Bob and Peter into the fantastic world of the online game "In the Land of Dragons". And a seemingly harmless game quickly turns into a deadly danger: everything points to the fact that the virtual figures have found their way into reality and are up to mischief here...

summary: Preparations for a big auction are in full swing at the scrapyard. Suddenly, a menacing giant appears and tasks the three detectives with a mysterious case. The trail leads deeper and deeper into times long past. Justus, Peter and Bob have no idea that they will soon be caught up in a maelstrom of dangerous events. But mysterious riddles, nocturnal shadows, ghostly smoke and an armed phantom soon make it clear to the three ??? that all their skills will be required if they are not to fall by the wayside. Nothing is as it seems at first glance...

title: The Mystery of the Fire Spirit
summary: The privately run opera Califia in Rocky Beach is on the brink of financial collapse. So it's not surprising that the three ??? initially believe it's a promotional event when an employee of the opera turns to them for help: Mysterious things are going on in the building's vaulted cellar - and a strange creature has been spotted! Justus, Peter and Bob take on the case and have no idea what they are getting themselves into. Suddenly, a huge fire breaks out during a performance! Was it arson? What role do the obscure Moody Firthway and his red notebook play? Justus is the only one who recognizes what is really going on behind the scenes.

title: The Night of the Tigers
summary: Who is the unknown client in the new case of the three successful detectives from Rocky Beach? As if by magic, coded messages appear on the computer screen at the headquarters. Justus' ambition is awakened and the three detectives begin to investigate. They solve the stranger's complicated riddles and follow his trail. In the process, the three boys become increasingly entangled in dubious machinations. When it turns out that a good friend of theirs could be the culprit, Justus, Peter and Bob are faced with a difficult decision: should they hand over their friend or keep the truth from the police? Justus comes up with a plan - and the three ??? discover the unimaginable in the 'Night of the Tigers'...

summary: When the three ??? receive mail from an old friend, they have no idea what a dangerous adventure awaits them. The mysterious call for help takes them to the middle of the South Dakota wasteland. There they witness incomprehensible events that haunt a remote prairie village. What dark secret is behind the eerie fog that is terrifying the inhabitants? And what is the story behind the ghastly screams that keep emanating from the white clouds? The three detectives take up the investigation - and fall into the clutches of the fog themselves.

summary: Actually, the three ??? are only supposed to deliver a car for Uncle Titus. But the thick fog in the mountains forces them to look for accommodation there. A strange pick-up driver leads them to the 'King of the Mountain', a run-down hotel without a single guest. Soon strange things begin to happen that can only mean one thing: The hotel harbors a secret. Does the wreckage of an airplane that crashed in the mountains years ago have anything to do with it?

title: The Shadow of the Giant
summary: The three ??? accompany Mr. Andrews on a research trip to Yosemite National Park. But instead of relaxing, Justus, Bob and Peter suddenly find themselves in the middle of a highly dangerous case: one of them is shot, mysterious traces of blood in the forest puzzle them and the three detectives make a terrible discovery. Finally, it comes to a life-or-death climb up Half Dome, the large granite rock in the park...

title: The Mystery of the Crystal Skull
summary: A harmless junk shop ends in a chase for the three ??? The search for a valuable crystal skull begins! The recently deceased Hunter Scott is said to have owned such a skull. Crafted by the Maya, it supposedly has healing powers. But where in his villa could it be hidden? Justus, Peter and Bob aren't the only ones wondering - because some shady characters are after the crystal skull. Will the three detectives be quicker?

title: The Web of Lies
summary: A burglar who doesn't steal anything but leaves objects behind? Strange things are going on in Rocky Beach, if that's not a case for the three ???! What at first seems harmless follows a pattern and it is precisely this pattern that Just, Peter and Bob are trying to decipher. But someone is doing everything in their power to prevent the detectives from shedding light on the mystery. Will the three friends solve the case before disaster strikes, or will they become entangled in a web of lies?

title: The Mystery of the Devil's Cliff
summary: Peter Shaw - a murderer? Definitely not! Justus and Bob are sure of it. Can they prove the Second Detective's innocence? Peter sees him fall, but the Devil's Cliff won't give him back. Swallowed up by the roaring waves, the man remains missing ... What has happened? The second detective, of all people, is accused of having pushed Paul Forster into the sea. During the interrogation, Peter is questioned down to the last detail. Meanwhile, Justus and Bob try to find out more about the strange case. Can they help their friend?

title: The Forest of Dangers
summary: From Rocky Beach to the Rocky Mountains - the three ??? are looking forward to a hiking weekend. What begins harmlessly turns into a fight for survival! Even before the hiking group sets off, the three detectives sense a new case: a dead letterbox and a tripping hazard - is someone trying to stop the tour? Things get dicey on the very first stage. A stream turns into a raging river, and mushrooms should be enjoyed with caution. When Peter disappears, it becomes clear that the wilderness has something to hide. The three ??? find themselves in a forest of dangers ...

title: The Manuscript of Satan
summary: A manuscript of Satan incarnate and diabolical noise attacks - this case has it all! Are the three ??? in hellish danger? Who is behind the horrific noise attack on Professor Bancroft's house? While the scientist tries to translate a mysterious old manuscript, Justus, Peter and Bob set off in search of the source of the noise. Do the attacks have something to do with Satan's manuscript, which the professor is currently working on? The three detectives will find out.

title: The Mystery of the Outlaws
summary: Peter involuntarily witnesses a dubious phone call at Rocky Beach High School. Does his teacher Amanda Blunt have a dark secret? When the inconspicuous woman packs suspicious paraphernalia into her car and drives off, Peter sets off in pursuit. Not without informing his two friends, of course. The three ??? set off on a dangerous road trip through the deserted prairie. Hopefully this trip will not be their undoing

title: The Mystery of the Bone Man
summary: A woman suddenly disappears without a trace after an earthquake. What has happened to her? The three ??? embark on a dangerous search. The young seamstress Maya doesn't show up for work at the Camelot Theatre. Justus, Peter and Bob suspect that the mystery organized by the theater management has something to do with it. Because there is a lot of prize money to be won. Is the solution to the riddle also the trail to Maya? The three detectives investigate while the earth shakes again ...

title: The Yacht of Betrayal
summary: Justus Jonas is unique - or is he? An unexpected visitor and a theft lead the three ??? to the yacht of betrayal. Justus, Peter and Bob can hardly believe their eyes when they come face to face with Ian Carew again. An old case connects the detectives with the son of the former Prime Minister of Nanda. No wonder Ian is looking for their help again. He is in Rocky Beach on behalf of his country, but someone is following him and his hotel room has been broken into. Can the three ??? help their friend?
